command.name: convert-to-plan
command.description: Convert planning artifacts (lite-plan, workflow session, markdown) to issue solutions

intent.primary_user_value: Turn an existing planning artifact into a normalized issue Solution and bind it to an issue (create new or attach to an existing issue).

must_not: Do not read or edit .workflow/issues/*.jsonl directly for issue/solution operations; use ccw issue CLI commands.
Do not skip confirmation unless -y/--yes is provided.
Do not claim implementation pointers are Existing unless they are verifiable in the repo.

p0: Supports sources: lite-plan dir, workflow session ID/folder, markdown file, json file
Persists a Solution in .workflow/issues/solutions/<issue-id>.jsonl and binds it to the issue via CLI
Uses ccw issue CLI (status/init/bind/solutions/solution) for issue operations
